results.description: Patrick Bamford scores his first goal since August as promotion-chasing Leeds United hold out for victory over Blackburn.
results.shortTitle: Bamford ends goal drought as Leeds win
results.title: Leeds United 2-1 Blackburn Rovers: Patrick Bamford scores for first time since August as hosts win

results.description: From Bolton's 'purple patch' to Gareth Ainsworth's potential chart-topper, it was another weird and wonderful Saturday in the EFL.
results.shortTitle: Five things you may have missed in the EFL
results.title: EFL: Five things you may have missed

results.description: John Buckley's first senior goal caps a thrilling finale as Blackburn come from behind to beat Sheffield Wednesday.
results.shortTitle: Blackburn strike late on to beat Owls
results.title: Blackburn Rovers 2-1 Sheffield Wednesday: John Buckley's late winner sees off Owls

results.description: Preston North End come from two goals down to beat Blackburn and go second in the Championship table.
results.shortTitle: Preston come from behind to beat Blackburn
results.title: Preston North End 3-2 Blackburn Rovers: Barkhuizen double inspires Preston comeback

results.description: Maxime Colin scores the winner as Birmingham City beat Blackburn Rovers to secure back-to-back home wins.
results.shortTitle: Colin earns Blues win against Blackburn
results.title: Birmingham City 1-0 Blackburn Rovers: Maxime Colin nets winner for home side

results.description: Juninho Bacuna comes off the bench to score for the third game running as Huddersfield battle back to draw at Blackburn.
results.shortTitle: Bacuna earns Terriers draw at Blackburn
results.title: Blackburn Rovers 2-2 Huddersfield Town: Juninho Bacuna scores again off the bench

results.description: Blackburn Rovers defender Darragh Lenihan is ruled out for up to eight weeks after picking up a knee injury in their loss to QPR.
results.shortTitle: Blackburn's Lenihan out with knee injury
results.title: Darragh Lenihan: Blackburn defender ruled out for six to eight weeks with knee injury

results.description: Queens Park Rangers beat Blackburn Rovers in a match that produced five second-half goals at Loftus Road.
results.shortTitle: QPR beat Blackburn in six-goal thriller
results.title: Queens Park Rangers 4-2 Blackburn Rovers: Wells, Eze, Osayi-Samuel & Hugill give Rangers win

results.description: Joe Lolley's strike earns Nottingham Forest a draw at Blackburn and extends their unbeaten league run to nine games.
results.shortTitle: Lolley earns Forest a point at Rovers
results.title: Blackburn Rovers 1-1 Nottingham Forest: Joe Lolley earns Reds draw

results.description: Matty Pearson scores against his former club as Luton beat Blackburn to end a three-match losing run in the Championship.
results.shortTitle: Pearson goal sinks former club Blackburn
results.title: Blackburn Rovers 1-2 Luton Town: Matty Pearson goal beats former club

results.description: Goals from Adam Armstrong and Bradley Dack are enough for Blackburn as they hold off Reading in the Championship.
results.shortTitle: Blackburn hold off Reading comeback for win
results.title: Reading 1-2 Blackburn: Rovers hold off late Royals fight back

results.description: Blackburn Rovers complete the signing of former Tottenham midfielder Lewis Holtby on a two-year contract.
results.shortTitle: Blackburn sign Holtby on two-year deal
results.title: Lewis Holtby: Blackburn Rovers sign former Tottenham midfielder on two-year deal

results.description: Derrick Williams and Bradley Dack score the goals as Blackburn secure a home victory over Millwall in the Championship.
results.shortTitle: Blackburn earn home win over Millwall
results.title: Blackburn 2-0 Millwall: Williams and Dack goals see off Lions

results.description: Ex-Blackburn striker Matt Jansen relives the serious accident that derailed his career and left him with depression and anxiety.
results.shortTitle: 'They thought I'd died' - Jansen on scooter crash
results.title: Matt Jansen: Ex-Blackburn striker on scooter accident, depression and anxiety

thumbnail.altText: Matt Jansen in action for Blackburn Rovers

results.description: West Brom remain unbeaten after beating Blackburn 3-2 in a match that featured five first-half goals.
results.shortTitle: West Brom still unbeaten after thrilling win
results.title: West Bromwich Albion 3-2 Blackburn Rovers: West Brom win five-goal thriller

results.description: First-half goals from Richard Stearman and Oliver Norwood help Sheffield United beat Blackburn 2-1 to reach the Carabao Cup third round.
results.shortTitle: Sheff Utd beat Blackburn to go through
results.title: Carabao Cup: Sheffield Utd 2-1 Blackburn

thumbnail.altText: Richard Stearman scores for Sheffield United against Blackburn in the Carabao Cup

results.description: Cardiff City picked up their first away point of the season as they were held to a goalless draw at Blackburn Rovers.
results.shortTitle: Blackburn & Cardiff in goalless draw
results.title: Blackburn Rovers 0-0 Cardiff City: Woodwork hit three times in goalless draw

thumbnail.altText: Robert Glatzel of Cardiff and Derrick Williams of Blackburn Rovers chase the ball

results.description: Northampton Town sign goalkeeper Andrew Fisher on loan from Championship side Blackburn Rovers until January.
results.shortTitle: Cobblers sign Blackburn keeper on loan
results.title: Andrew Fisher: Northampton Town sign Blackburn Rovers goalkeeper on loan

results.description: Hull City are made to pay for missing a penalty as Derrick Williams' goal sees Blackburn Rovers to victory in the Championship.
results.shortTitle: Williams earns Blackburn win at Hull
results.title: Hull City 0-1 Blackburn Rovers: Derrick Williams goal gives Rovers win

results.description: Jonathan Woodgate's wait for a first win as Middlesbrough boss goes on as Danny Graham's penalty gives Blackburn victory.
results.shortTitle: Blackburn extend Boro's winless start
results.title: Blackburn Rovers 1-0 Middlesbrough: Boro's winless start continues
